title: Worst fed champ to face
body:
title says it all. which champ is the worst to have to fight, during the course of regular gameplay, (teamfights, ganks, 1v1, ect) when fed?

I'm gonna have to say {{champion:120}}   or   {{champion:102}}  imo. they get so tanky, have mobility (insane levels on hec's part) and can still do really good dps against moderate defense champs

replies.body: Have you people really forgotten rengar and khazix?
Mainly if you are playing adc

{{champion:75}}  i just got a early game spike


{{champion:14}}  cant really kill me
{{champion:23}} Pretty hard to 1 vs 1 and kite.
